title: Vector Solutions Adds Cybersecurity Courses to Online Training for Schools
description: Vector Solutions, a company that provides education and industry training courses, announced it has added eight new courses to its stable of education courses for Kâ€“12 schools. The courses address key areas of cybersecurity awareness for education leaders and employees and include topics such as creating a cybersecurity culture, preventing social engineering attacks, laws and compliance, best practices, and more. Information about the courses will be available starting Oct. 1, 2022.
